scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm install --no-audit && npm run security-fix && cd IPT-TAILWIND && npm install --no-audit && npm run build && cd ../admin && npm install --no-audit && npx tailwindcss -i ./style/tailwind.css -o ./style/output.css --minify && mkdir -p dist && cp -r assets dist/ && cp -r style dist/ && cd .. && node scripts/copy-assets.js && cd backend && npm install --no-audit
scripts.security-fix: npm audit fix --force && cd backend && npm audit fix --force && cd ../IPT-TAILWIND && npm audit fix --force && cd ../admin && npm audit fix --force
scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm install --no-audit && cd ../IPT-TAILWIND && npm install --no-audit && cd ../admin && npm install --no-audit
